type ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler = delegate of obj * ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs -> unit

param.span: 事件的來源，即 控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立 委派 (Delegate) 時，就可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的商務物件的控制和控制項刪除資料。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 一開始會顯示一組使用的方法，由所指定的所有員工屬性來擷取資料的`EmployeeLogic`物件。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因為屬性設定為`true`、控制自動顯示**刪除** 按鈕。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果您按一下**刪除** 按鈕，執行動作時使用的方法，由指定屬性和任何參數中指定的集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此程式碼範例中，也會執行一些前置處理和後置處理步驟。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委派呼叫以處理事件之前執行動作，而`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委派呼叫以處理事件之後的動作完成後，執行例外狀況處理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to perform exception handling. 在此範例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`會擲回，它由處理這個委派。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. 若要檢查的實作`EmployeeLogic`中介層商務物件，使用這個程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in .
